CustomField.formula: IF( OR(OPME__c > 0, Huawei__c > 0), 'Exclusiva', IF( AND( OpportunityId != '006U4000003toGz', OpportunityId != '006U40000052kwj', OpportunityId != '006U4000005yCoD', OpportunityId != '006U4000003uLo1', OpportunityId != '006U4000008Uw1x', OpportunityId != '006U400000Go7Rj', BillingState = "São Paulo" ), "Região SP", IF( OR( BillingState == "Acre", BillingState == "Amazonas", BillingState == "Amapá", BillingState == "Pará", BillingState == "Rondônia", BillingState == "Roraima", OpportunityId == '006U4000003toGz', OpportunityId == '006U4000005rhLj', OpportunityId == '006U40000052kwj', OpportunityId == '006U4000005yCoD', OpportunityId == '006U4000003uLo1', OpportunityId == '006U4000008Uw1x' ), "Região Norte", IF( OR( BillingState = "Rio de Janeiro", BillingState = "Espírito Santo", BillingState = "Paraná", BillingState = "Santa Catarina", BillingState = "Rio Grande do Sul" ), "Região RJ/ES/Sul", IF( OR( BillingState = "Mato Grosso", BillingState = "Mato Grosso do Sul" ), "Região MT/MS", IF( BillingState = "Distrito Federal", "Região DF", IF( OR( BillingState = "Minas Gerais", BillingState = "Ceará", BillingState = "Piauí", BillingState = "Rio Grande do Norte", BillingState = "Piauí", BillingState = "Paraíba", BillingState = "Pernambuco", BillingState = "Sergipe", BillingState = "Maranhão", BillingState = "Bahia", BillingState = "Alagoas" ), "Região NE/MG", "Região GO/TO" )))))))
CustomField.label: Região
